spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is recognizable, but significant door and window placement errors exist. The balcony wall is missing. The entryway orientation is swapped with the linen closet.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major structural errors: Hallway door into Bedroom 1 is missing/replaced with a wall. Garage is rendered as an open tray rather than a structure. Several interior doors are rendered as solid wall blocks or arched openings without clear leaves.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and appliances are mostly accurate. Bathroom fixtures are placed correctly relative to the plan. Hallucinated block in the dining area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent rendering quality, clean geometry, and consistent lighting. Accurate isometric camera angle and clear material differentiation.

detected_errors.description: Missing doorway from the hallway into Bedroom 1.
Linen closet and main entry door positions are flipped/misplaced.
Hallucinated green block/furniture in the lounge/dining area not present in the plan.
Garage is flattened into a baseplate rather than an enclosed room as shown on the plan.
Missing enclosure wall for the north-facing balcony.
Bedroom 2 window is rendered as a large full-height glass panel rather than a standard window centered on the wall.
